member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC
member.summary: Describes a function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.Version
member.summary: The shader version. See also .

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.Creator
member.summary: The name of the originator of the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.Flags
member.summary: A combination of D3DCOMPILE Constants that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies shader compilation and parsing.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.ConstantBuffers
member.summary: The number of constant buffers for the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.BoundResources
member.summary: The number of bound resources for the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.InstructionCount
member.summary: The number of emitted instructions for the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.TempRegisterCount
member.summary: The number of temporary registers used by the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.TempArrayCount
member.summary: The number of temporary arrays used by the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.DefCount
member.summary: The number of constant defines for the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.DclCount
member.summary: The number of declarations (input + output) for the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.TextureNormalInstructions
member.summary: The number of non-categorized texture instructions for the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.TextureLoadInstructions
member.summary: The number of texture load instructions for the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.TextureCompInstructions
member.summary: The number of texture comparison instructions for the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.TextureBiasInstructions
member.summary: The number of texture bias instructions for the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.TextureGradientInstructions
member.summary: The number of texture gradient instructions for the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.FloatInstructionCount
member.summary: The number of floating point arithmetic instructions used by the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.IntInstructionCount
member.summary: The number of signed integer arithmetic instructions used by the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.UintInstructionCount
member.summary: The number of unsigned integer arithmetic instructions used by the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.StaticFlowControlCount
member.summary: The number of static flow control instructions used by the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.DynamicFlowControlCount
member.summary: The number of dynamic flow control instructions used by the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.MacroInstructionCount
member.summary: The number of macro instructions used by the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.ArrayInstructionCount
member.summary: The number of array instructions used by the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.MovInstructionCount
member.summary: The number of mov instructions used by the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.MovcInstructionCount
member.summary: The number of movc instructions used by the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.ConversionInstructionCount
member.summary: The number of type conversion instructions used by the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.BitwiseInstructionCount
member.summary: The number of bitwise arithmetic instructions used by the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.MinFeatureLevel
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the minimum Direct3D feature level target of the function byte code.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.RequiredFeatureFlags
member.summary: A value that contains a combination of one or more shader requirements flags; each flag specifies a requirement of the shader. A default value of 0 means there are no requirements. For a list of values, see .

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.Name
member.summary: The name of the function.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.FunctionParameterCount
member.summary: The number of logical parameters in the function signature, not including the return value.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.HasReturn
member.summary: Indicates whether the function returns a value. TRUE indicates it returns a value; otherwise, FALSE (it is a subroutine).

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.Has10Level9VertexShader
member.summary: Indicates whether there is a Direct3D 10Level9 vertex shader blob. TRUE indicates there is a 10Level9 vertex shader blob; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: D3D12_FUNCTION_DESC.Has10Level9PixelShader
member.summary: Indicates whether there is a Direct3D 10Level9 pixel shader blob. TRUE indicates there is a 10Level9 pixel shader blob; otherwise, FALSE.
